name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 412 | Banana Growth Observation
description:
This record documents the growth stage of a banana bunch at MaMeeFarm™.

The image captures the current condition of the bananas still on the tree, indicating that the fruit has not yet reached harvest readiness.
Based on on-site observation at the time of recording, the estimated harvest window is approximately two weeks from the capture date.

A preliminary plan has been noted to harvest around 15 January 2026, subject to actual growth conditions.

Recorded Context:

Location: Banana Tree, MaMeeFarm™

Crop Status: Growing, not yet harvested

Planned Harvest Date (Estimate): 2026-01-15

Date Displayed: 2025-12-30

Time Displayed: 07:22
